programs.program_name: BA (Hons) Film Production (3+0), University of Sunderland, UK

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Minimum of grade E in 2 subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Minimum of grade B in 5 subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Minimum of grade C in 2 subjects and an average CGPA of 2.0.
entry_requirements_raw.CPU: 5 subjects with a minimum score of 50%.
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE: 5 subjects with a minimum score of 50%.

course_content.core:
Year 1 Core Modules Production Skills
Sound Design and Production 1 
Scriptwriting
Introduction to Film Studies
Factual Film
Short Film Production Production Skills Sound Design and Production 1 Scriptwriting Introduction to Film Studies Factual Film Short Film Production Year 2 Core Modules Filmmaking for Film Festivals
Film Theory and Criticism
Video Documentary Production 
Guerrilla Filmmaking Filmmaking for Film Festivals Film Theory and Criticism Video Documentary Production Guerrilla Filmmaking Year 3 Core Modules Advanced Digital Fictional Film 
High End Video Project
Practical Final Project Advanced Digital Fictional Film High End Video Project Practical Final Project

programs.program_name: BA (Hons) Social Media Management (3+0), University of Sunderland, UK

entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Minimum of grade B in 5 subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Minimum of grade C in 2 subjects and an average CGPA of 2.0.
entry_requirements_raw.CPU: 5 subjects with a minimum score of 50%.
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE: 5 subjects with a minimum score of 50%.

course_content.core:
Year 1
• Introduction to Social Media A
• Introduction to Social Media B
• Essential Media Law and Regulation
• Essential Journalism
• Community Engagement
• Introduction to PR Theory and Practice
• Digital Image Creation  Year 2
• Data Analysis and Visualisation
• Social Media: Theory and Practice
• Ready Player One: Operating within the
Streaming Industry
• Placement and Practice
• Practical PR, Strategy and Theory  Year 3
• Advanced Public Relations
• Advanced Community Engagement
• Social Media Management Practical Project A
• Social Media Management Practical Project B
• Branded Content and Ecommerce Video
• In-Company Practical Training
